response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its quality, features, and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 12000}
